message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $11,000. It's a great deal, and I'm confident it's worth the price. Let me know what you think!
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,500. I'm willing to make a serious offer, but I need to stay within my budget.

Bob, I appreciate you making an offer. I understand you're working with a budget, but $9,500 just doesn't work for me. I'm willing to come down to $10,500. This is a fair price for both of us, and I'm confident you'll see the value in this product.
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $10,500, but I'm still a bit short on budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $10,000, but that's the highest I can go. Can you consider this offer?
